articles.author: Aitor Hernández-Morales
articles.title: EU chiefs chastise Trump for sanctioning the ICC - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: In a first jab at the White House, Ursula von der Leyen and António Costa said the U.S. president’s move to target the International Criminal Court undermines global justice.
articles.content: Trump’s order is seen as a response to the Court’s decision to issue arrest warrants last November for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Israel’s former Defense Minister Yoav Gallant for … [+1062 chars]
